DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research develop test feasibility Habit , weight loss mobile application design coach patient weight loss challenge . In pilot randomize trial 50 obese participant , test feasibility Smart Coach mobile application pair shorten online-delivered ( 8-week ) behavioral weight loss intervention relative shorten behavioral weight intervention . Feasibility outcomes include frequency duration usage mobile app feature , recruitment , retention . Post-intervention focus group discuss feasibility acceptability intervention . The investigator also exploratory analysis compare condition problem solve skill weight loss 8 week , inform subsequent randomize control efficacy trial .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial Problem-Solving Weight Loss Mobile Application
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose develop test feasibility Habit , weight loss mobile app include common feature self-monitoring , goal setting , social network , even importantly , avatar-facilitated , idiographic problem solve feature process information intelligently help patient identify solution weight loss problem . In pilot randomize trial 50 obese participant , test feasibility Habit mobile application pair shorten ( 8 week ) behavioral weight loss intervention relative shorten behavioral weight intervention . Feasibility outcomes include frequency duration usage mobile app feature , recruitment , retention . The investigator also exploratory analysis compare condition problem solve skill weight loss 8 week , inform subsequent randomize control efficacy trial . Data support efficacy trial Habit-assisted brief behavioral weight loss intervention relative brief behavioral weight loss intervention alone 1 year follow-up . The investigator overarch goal develop mobile technology reduces intensity lifestyle intervention far possible preserve weight loss outcome , ultimately broaden reach .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Participants must 1 ) BMI 30 45 , 2 ) currently use smartphone Android software , 3 ) connectivity internet home work , 4 ) PCP write clearance , 5 ) age 18 older . Exclusion : 1 . Ages < 18 2 . BMI < 30 > 45 3 . Does currently use smart phone Android software version 4.4 later 4 . Does use smartphone support app ( assess model type phone participant ) 5 . Does connectivity internet home work ; wifi access home 6 . Does use smart phone regularly throughout day 7 . Has use Android smartphone least year 8 . Has use weight loss mobile app last 6 month 9 . Does Facebook account , use infrequently , actively engage Facebook 10 . Does gmail account unwilling create one 11 . Does PCP write clearance 12 . Bipolar disorder , substance abuse , psychosis , bulimia , severe depression 13 . Pregnant lactate 14 . Had bariatric surgery 15 . Medication affect weight 16 . Adults unwilling provide consent 17 . Prisoners 18 . Unable read understand English 19 . Has type 1 2 diabetes 20 . Have concern audiotaped 21 . Unable walk unaided 22 . Has medical condition precludes lifestyle change
